name.description: Specifies the name of the Logic App Workflow. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Resource Group in which the Logic App Workflow should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the Logic App Workflow exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

workflow_schema.description: Specifies the Schema to use for this Logic App Workflow. Defaults to `https://schema.management.azure.com/providers/Microsoft.Logic/schemas/2016-06-01/workflowdefinition.json#`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

workflow_version.description: Specifies the version of the Schema used for this Logic App Workflow. Defaults to `1.0.0.0`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

parameters.notes: Any parameters specified must exist in the Schema defined in `workflow_schema`.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

access_endpoint.description: The Access Endpoint for the Logic App Workflow.

connector_endpoint_ip_addresses.description: The list of access endpoint ip addresses of connector.

connector_outbound_ip_addresses.description: The list of outgoing ip addresses of connector.

workflow_endpoint_ip_addresses.description: The list of access endpoint ip addresses of workflow.

workflow_outbound_ip_addresses.description: The list of outgoing ip addresses of workflow.

create.description: Used when creating the Logic App Workflow.

update.description: Used when updating the Logic App Workflow.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Logic App Workflow.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Logic App Workflow.
